scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/types && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/web && npm run typecheck -w apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w apps/api
